Package paint.shapes

Class VectorGraphic2Point

  • java.lang.Object
    • paint.shapes.VectorGraphic
      • paint.shapes.VectorGraphic2Point
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ellipse, Line, Plot, Rectangle
    public abstract class VectorGraphic2Point
extends VectorGraphic
    Abstract class that sets up the methods for the shape classes that will extend this class

      • VectorGraphic2Point

        public VectorGraphic2Point​(double startX,
                           double startY,
                           double endX,
                           double endY)
        Abstract constructor for creating all shapes except polygon
        Parameters:
        startX - vector interpolation for start x point for drawing shapes
        startY - vector interpolation for end y point for drawing shapes
        endX - vector interpolation for start x point for drawing shapes
        endY - vector interpolation for end x point for drawing shapes

      • VectorGraphic2Point

        public VectorGraphic2Point​(java.lang.String line,
                           java.awt.Color penColor,
                           java.awt.Color fillColor,
                           java.lang.Integer width,
                           java.lang.Integer height)
        Abstract constructor for creating shapes based off a string
        Parameters:
        line - string parameter which holds a line from an input file
        penColor - pen colour for shape
        fillColor - fill colour for shape
        width - width of screen to properly draw shape based off screen size
        height - height of screen to properly draw shape based off screen size
